name: DREAMSNATCHER
description:
Blood and Gore in game. Be warned.

DEV NOTE: We are going to do a day 1 patch so there will be more content!

In the depths of an ancient eldritch temple, the herald of a new age is born. Sustain thy wretched cosmic soul by feasting on the fears of friend and foe alike.  Arise, dreamsnatcher.

CONTROLS

Move with W A S D
Left click to bite
Right click to activate evolution abilities 
Scroll to change abilities 
Kill enemies to recharge fear essence, a resource which represents both your health and your abilities
Absorb powerful mortals to evolve into a new form and regain your strength
